passive.name: BERSERKER RAGE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) BERSERKER RAGE
                                Olaf gains 70% ~ 110%% Attack Speed () and 15% ~ 30% Physical Vamp () per 1% of his missing Health, capped at 70% missing Health.

q.name: (Q) UNDERTOW
q.description:
(Q) UNDERTOW
 7s   45/50/55/60 
                                
                                
                                Throws an axe, dealing 50 physical damage (50/120/190/260 + 100% bonus ) and slowing by 20/25/30/35% for 2 seconds.Enemy champions hit have their armor reduced by 20% for 4 seconds.Picking up the axe reduces Undertow's cooldown by 4.5 seconds.

w.name: (W) VICIOUS STRIKES
w.description:
(W) VICIOUS STRIKES
 15/14/13/12s   30 
                                
                                
                                Olaf gains 35/50/65/80% Attack Speed for 4 seconds and grants himself a shield that absorbs 35 (35/70/105/140 + 15% missing health) for 2.5 seconds with an amount that is capped at 70% of missing health.

e.name: (E) RECKLESS SWING
e.description:
(E) RECKLESS SWING
 9.8/8.8/7.8/6.8s  
                                
                                
                                Dash to an enemy and deal 87 true damage (55/115/175/235 + 50% ). If the enemy does not die, Olaf takes 28 true damage (18/36/54/72 + 15% ).Attacks lower the cooldown of Reckless Swing by 1 second.Deal 95% damage to monsters.

r.name: (R) RAGNAROK
r.description:
(R) RAGNAROK
 60/55/50s  
                                
                                
                                Passive: Gain 25/35/45 Armor and Magic Resist.Active: Becomes immune to crowd control and gains 18 Attack Damage (5/15/25 + 20% ) for 4 seconds. Also gains 20/45/70% Movement Speed when moving toward enemy champions for 1 second upon cast. Ragnarok's duration is increased by 2.5s  for each basic attack or cast of Reckless Swing against an enemy champion.Ragnarok can be cast while under the effects of crowd control.

core_items_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
core_items_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.
